name: Cyber Storm Edge 64
storyline:
In a distant universe, even though the Planet is safe, the True Reality was broken by the Space Pirates in an attempt to frustrate Edge, since he defeated them earlier. Now it's up to Edge collect the lost data files to reassemble the True Reality and defeat the Space Pirates from Cyber Storm again!

"The True Reality, a reality between the mind and the physical."

"There exists hope, reassemble the True Reality, Edge!"
summary: 64-bits inspired 3D Fast-paced Action Platformer! Collect the disks and unlock new worlds to choose from! Speedrun through past stages to achieve better times and earn gold medals!
